about_the_game:
The world's mightiest kingdoms wage war for glory. On the battlefield, tactics are king as you lead your army to victory.

Collect troops, build an army, and battle opposing leaders in turn-based tactical combat. Lead a wide variety of soldiers, from powerful pyromancers to deadly assassins, and defeat the enemy's forces. Capture the opposing Commander to proclaim victory; recruit new troops, refine your tactics, and continue fighting to become the most powerful kingdom in the world.

Real-Time Tactical Battles


Lead your unique army into battle. Take turns moving troops, attacking enemies, and using your soldiers' unique abilities to capture the opposing kingdom's most crucial troop: the Commander. Don't forget to protect your own Commander, or your kingdom may face a swift defeat. Careful planning and creative tactics are crucial to claiming victory and earning glory for your nation.

Play real-time 1v1 multiplayer duels, or challenge another player to a friendly match.

Collect Troops


Collect a wide variety of troops, each with unique strengths and abilities. Unlock troops from five distinct classes: soldiers, paladins, mages, rogues, and commanders.

Build a Unique Army


Use the troops you recruit to build a unique army to lead into battle. Will you build an army of rogues to flank your enemy and take them by surprise? Or will you use mages' empowering abilities to transform your paladins into unstoppable warriors? Master the strengths and weaknesses of your troops, including their unique movement patterns, abilities, and fighting capabilities. Discover unstoppable synergies between different troops and devise clever strategies to lead your army to victory. With so many troops to choose from, the only limit is your creativity!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Intel® Core™2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.3 GHz Intel® Core™2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: Fight for your Kingdom! Collect unique pieces, form a powerful army, and defeat opponents in action-packed turn-based battles. Utilize strategy and tactics to outsmart your enemies and capture their Commander, before they capture yours.
